description: The material instances for a block. Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance.

texture.description: Name of a texture from the terrain_texture.json file.

ambient_occlusion.description: Should this material have ambient occlusion applied when lighting.

face_dimming.description: Should this material have ambient occlusion applied when lighting.
